mapper.select: SELECT wo.WORK_ORDER_NUM, wo.WORK_ORDER_ID, mm.MATERIAL_ID, mm.MATERIAL_CODE, mm.MATERIAL_NAME, eo.EO_ID, eo.eo_num, eo.IDENTIFICATION eo_IDENTIFICATION, eo.CREATION_DATE eo_CREATION_DATE, eo.STATUS eo_status_code, gst.DESCRIPTION eo_status_DESCRIPTION, sn.site_in_date, sn.created_by sn_created_by, iu.real_name sn_created_by_name FROM hme_eo_job_sn sn, mt_wkc_shift wks, mt_mod_organization_rel mor1, mt_mod_organization_rel mor2, mt_work_order wo, mt_material mm, mt_gen_status gs, mt_gen_status_tl gst, iam_user iu, mt_eo eo WHERE sn.shift_id = wks.WKC_SHIFT_ID AND sn.workcell_id = mor1.ORGANIZATION_ID AND mor1.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' AND mor1.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' AND mor1.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = mor2.ORGANIZATION_ID AND mor2.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' AND mor2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_type = 'WORKCELL' AND mor2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = wks.workcell_id AND sn.rework_flag = 'N' AND eo.EO_ID = sn.eo_id AND eo.WORK_ORDER_ID = wo.WORK_ORDER_ID AND mm.MATERIAL_ID = eo.MATERIAL_ID AND gs.MODULE = 'ORDER' AND gs.STATUS_GROUP = 'EO_STATUS' AND gs.STATUS_CODE = eo.`STATUS` and gst.GEN_STATUS_ID = gs.GEN_STATUS_ID and gst.LANG = #{lang} AND iu.id = sn.created_by and mor1.TOP_SITE_ID = mor2.TOP_SITE_ID AND mor2.SEQUENCE = ( SELECT min(mor3.SEQUENCE) FROM mt_mod_organization_rel mor3 WHERE mor3.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' AND mor3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_type = 'WORKCELL' and mor3.TOP_SITE_ID = mor1.TOP_SITE_ID AND mor3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = wks.workcell_id) and wks.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} and mor1.TOP_SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND wks.SHIFT_DATE = #{shiftDate} AND wks.SHIFT_CODE = #{shiftCode} AND wks.workcell_id = #{workcellId}

select sn.work_order_id , sn.eo_id , mrs.ROUTER_STEP_ID , mrs.SEQUENCE , cor.qty from hme_eo_job_sn sn , hme_wkc_complete_output_record cor , mt_wkc_shift wks , mt_router_step mrs where sn.eo_step_id = mrs.ROUTER_STEP_ID and sn.shift_id = wks.WKC_SHIFT_ID and cor.work_order_id = sn.work_order_id and cor.material_id = sn.sn_material_id and cor.workcell_id = wks.WORKCELL_ID and cor.wkc_shift_id = wks.WKC_SHIFT_ID and sn.eo_id is not null and sn.site_out_date is not null and sn.rework_flag = 'N' and cor.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND wks.SHIFT_DATE = #{shiftDate} AND wks.SHIFT_CODE = #{shiftCode} AND wks.workcell_id = #{workcellId};

select wo.work_order_num, wo.work_order_id, mm.material_id, mm.material_code, mm.material_name, eo.eo_id, eo.eo_num, eo.identification eo_identification, eo.creation_date eo_creation_date, eo.status eo_status_code, gst.description eo_status_description, sn.site_in_date, sn.created_by sn_created_by, iu.real_name sn_created_by_name from hme_eo_job_sn sn, mt_eo eo, mt_work_order wo, mt_material mm, mt_gen_status mgs, mt_gen_status_tl gst, hzero_platform.iam_user iu where sn.eo_id = eo.eo_id and eo.work_order_id = wo.work_order_id and mm.material_id = eo.material_id and iu.id = sn.site_out_by and mgs.module = 'ORDER' and mgs.status_group = 'EO_STATUS' and mgs.status_code = eo.status and mgs.gen_status_id = gst.gen_status_id and sn.rework_flag = 'N' and gst.lang = #{lang} and eo.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and
(sn.eo_id = #{dto.eoId} and sn.eo_step_id = #{dto.routerStepId})

select wo.work_order_num, wo.work_order_id, mm.material_id, mm.material_code, mm.material_name, eo.eo_id, eo.eo_num, eo.identification eo_identification, eo.creation_date eo_creation_date, eo.status eo_status_code, mgst.description eo_status_description, sn.site_in_date, sn.created_by sn_created_by, iu.real_name sn_created_by_name from mt_eo eo left join mt_work_order wo on wo.work_order_id = eo.work_order_id left join mt_material mm on mm.material_id = eo.material_id left join mt_gen_status mgs on mgs.status_code = eo.STATUS and mgs.module = 'ORDER' and mgs.status_group = 'EO_STATUS' left join mt_gen_status_tl mgst on mgst.gen_status_id = mgs.gen_status_id and mgst.lang = #{lang}, hme_eo_job_sn sn, mt_mod_organization_rel mmor1, mt_mod_organization_rel mmor2, mt_wkc_shift mws, mt_mod_workcell mmw, mt_mod_workcell_attr mmwa, iam_user iu where 1 = 1 and eo.eo_id = sn.eo_id and sn.eo_id is not null and sn.site_out_date is not null and sn.rework_flag = 'N' and sn.workcell_id = mmor2.organization_id and mmor2.organization_type = 'WORKCELL' and mmor2.parent_organization_id = mmw.workcell_id and mmor2.parent_organization_type = 'WORKCELL' and mmor2.top_site_id = mmor1.top_site_id and mmor1.organization_id = mmw.workcell_id and mmor1.organization_type = 'WORKCELL' and mmor1.parent_organization_id = mws.workcell_id and mmor1.parent_organization_type = 'WORKCELL' and mmw.workcell_id = mmwa.workcell_id and mmwa.attr_name = 'OUTPUT_FLAG' and mmwa.attr_value = 'Y' and mmwa.tenant_id = mmw.tenant_id and mmw.tenant_id = sn.tenant_id and sn.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and sn.shift_id = mws.wkc_shift_id and sn.site_out_by = iu.id and mmor2.top_site_id = #{siteId} and mws.workcell_id = #{workcellId} and mws.shift_date = #{shiftDate} and mws.shift_code = #{shiftCode}
